column2: Undoubtedly the cruellest ruler ever in Araby, Jaffar controlled the land for many years during the Crusades. Jaffar was a powerful sorcerer who in 1435 IC united Araby and ruled it as Sultan for fifteen years.

This fiery Djinn has succumbed to the addiction of the winds of fire. All restraints and composure are gone replaced with a desire to see flesh and bone succumb to the glorious flame that now enslaves it.
